version_description:
- new user interface
- seamless mapping functions
- real-time traffic information
- nearby routes search and bookmark on public transport routes

- better user experience with improved user interface
- iOS 8 compatibility
- fixed minor issues
support MTR route searching from Park and Ride function of the HKeRouting Apps

- Add new functions for Bookmarks on Individual Route, and
- viewing CCTV images along Point to Point Route in Bookmarks

- Support App Accessibility
- fix minor issues when running on iOS 9.3 or above

- Provide estimated time of arrival on Tram route option
- Fix minor issue on iOS 10 or above

- Provide a new “Elderly mode” to facilitate elderly searching public transport route, service information and fare concession
- Provide option of switching between “Regular mode” and “Elderly mode” operation

- Fix minor issues
- From version 3.0, the app provides a new “Elderly mode” to facilitate elderly searching public transport route, service information and fare concession. It offers options of switching between “Regular mode” and “Elderly mode” operation

(1) Fix minor issues
(2) Enhance performance of mapping functions
(3) Provide hyperlinking to operators' mobile apps to read estimated time of arrival of some franchised bus routes (required to enable "Current Location" on mobile phone)

(1) Fine tune user interface
(2) From version 3.2, enhance performance of mapping functions. Provide hyperlinking to operators' mobile apps to read estimated time of arrival of some franchised bus routes (required to enable "Current Location" on mobile phone)

(1) Update user interface
(2) From version 3.2, enhance performance of mapping functions. Provide hyperlinking to operators' mobile apps to read estimated time of arrival of some franchised bus routes (required to enable "Current Location" on mobile phone)

(1) Update user interface, including the enhancement on map input function
(2) Update the accessibility design
(3) From version 3.2, provide hyperlinking to operators' mobile apps to read estimated time of arrival of some franchised bus routes (required to enable "Current Location" on mobile

- New walking route search for Causeway Bay integrated with the public transport route enquiry.
- Provide information on pedestrian crossing facilities and pedestrian streets.
- Provide digital compass function for identifying current location and walking direction on map (GPS support on mobile phone required)

- From version 3.6, new walking route search for Causeway Bay integrated with the public transport route enquiry.
- From version 3.6, provide information on pedestrian crossing facilities and pedestrian streets.
- From version 3.6, provide digital compass function for identifying current location and walking direction on map (GPS support on mobile phone required)
- Provide information of kaito ferry services subject to demand

- From version 3.6, new walking route search for Causeway Bay integrated with the public transport route enquiry.
- From version 3.6, provide information on pedestrian crossing facilities and pedestrian streets.
- From version 3.6, provide digital compass function for identifying current location and walking direction on map (GPS support on mobile phone required)
- From version 3.7, provide information of kaito ferry services subject to demand
- From version 3.8, provide information of estimated time arrival of certain New Lantao Bus routes
Update to HKeMobility

Update to HKeMobility

(1) Walking network has been extended to Mong Kok and Yau Ma Tei, from version 4.6
(2) fix minor issue

Provide estimated time of arrival for franchised bus services of New World First Bus and Citybus.  The data is sourced from open dataset supplied by the company and available for download at Data.gov.hk
